qas.question: What is one reason that a homosexual would engage in heterosexual behavior?
What is a possible scenario that can occur when a closeted homosexual is in a heterosexual relationship?

answers.text: hide their respective orientations from their spouses

qas.question: What are some things that can cause a homosexual person to be with the opposite sex?

answers.text: desire for a perceived traditional family and concerns of discrimination and religious ostracism

qas.question: Can a homosexual person still grow their sexual identiries while with the opposit sex?

answers.text: others develop positive gay and lesbian identities while maintaining successful heterosexual marriages

qas.question: What kind of hardships can a homosexual face when admitting their ssexuality while in a heterosexual marriage?

answers.text: Coming out of the closet to oneself, a spouse of the opposite sex, and children

qas.question: Can a homosexual person hide their true idenitys?

answers.text: some LGBT people hide their respective orientations from their spouses

context: Gay and lesbian people can have sexual relationships with someone of the opposite sex for a variety of reasons, including the <a2_0>desire for a perceived traditional family and concerns of discrimination and <a0_0>religious ostracism<a2_0/><a0_0/>. While <a5_0>some LGBT people <a1_0>hide their respective orientations from their spouses<a5_0/><a1_0/>, <a3_0>others develop positive gay and lesbian identities while maintaining successful heterosexual marriages<a3_0/>. <a4_0>Coming out of the closet to oneself, a spouse of the opposite sex, and children<a4_0/> can present challenges that are not faced by gay and lesbian people who are not married to people of the opposite sex or do not have children.
